TopicTitle: What does the signature block of the facebook page mean?

Articles.Content: Hey, I've been intently focussed on the KSP facebook page over the last week or so, eagerly awaiting news about the forums and whenever a post was made the poster had a signature block of "DR KSP CM". I'm guessing KSP means Kerbal Space Program but what about the rest? Cheers!
Damion Rayne Kerbal Space Program Community Manager, or so I've been told.
